meanings.definition: The quality of being assertive or aggressive in pursuing one's goals.
meanings.sent1: Her pushfulness in negotiations helped her secure a better deal.
meanings.sent2: His pushfulness in sports made him a fierce competitor.
meanings.sent3: The team's pushfulness in the game was evident as they never gave up.
meanings.sent4: The pushfulness of the lioness protecting her cubs was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The pushfulness of the river carving through the rocks was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of exerting force to move something forward.
meanings.sent1: With a strong pushfulness, he managed to move the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The pushfulness of the wind made the sailboat glide effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The pushfulness of the toddler trying to push the swing was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The pushfulness of the bulldozer cleared the path in no time.
meanings.sent5: The pushfulness of the waves crashing against the shore was powerful.

meanings.definition: A tendency to be proactive and persistent in achieving desired outcomes.
meanings.sent1: Her pushfulness in studying paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: The team's pushfulness in fundraising ensured the event's success.
meanings.sent3: The pushfulness of the squirrel gathering nuts was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The pushfulness of the sun rising every day is a constant in life.
meanings.sent5: The pushfulness of the seed growing into a tree is a marvel of nature.
